subject: Soccer
Bribery and Kickbacks
lead_paragraph: Mohamed bin Hammam of Qatar will challenge FIFA in a two-day hearing in April at the Court of Arbitration for Sport in a bid to overturn his lifetime ban for alleged election bribery.
snippet: Mohamed bin Hammam of Qatar will challenge FIFA in a two-day hearing in April at the Court of Arbitration for Sport in a bid to overturn his lifetime ban for alleged election bribery.
